personal.name: Silvio Meneguzzo
personal.title: PhD Candidate in Blockchain & DLT
personal.bio: I am a PhD Candidate in Blockchain and Distributed Ledger Technologies, combining academic research (University of Turin) with industrial R&D (Links Foundation). My research focuses on data marketplaces (with emphasis on the energy domain), DAOs and governance sustainability, and privacy-preserving cryptographic techniques.

education.degree: PhD in Blockchain and Distributed Ledger Technology

education.description: Joint National Programme: University of Camerino, University of Turin, LINKS Foundation. Visiting researcher: Brunel University London (2024-2025). Research topics: energy data marketplaces, DAO governance & sustainability, ZK proofs / MPC / FHE.
